Files Headings

.travis.yml

 
sudo: false

language: node_js

node_js:
  - "0.8"
  - "0.10"
  - "0.12"
  - "1"
  - "2"
  - "3.2"
  - "4"
  - "5"
  - "6"
  - "7"

install:
  - PATH="`npm bin`:`npm bin -g`:$PATH"

Node 0.8 comes with a too obsolete npm

 
  - if [[ "`node --version`" =~ ^v0\.8\. ]]; then npm install -g npm@1.4.28 ; fi

Install dependencies and build

 
  - npm install

script:

Output useful info for debugging

 
  - node --version
  - npm --version

Run tests

 
  - npm test
